participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Emma is anxious yet creative, often finding solace in her hobbies.
participant_1.background: I'm scared of dying. Knitting is my passion. I've dogs. The county wide bake sale is where I feel most at home.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Lucas is excited and optimistic, always looking forward to new adventures.
participant_2.background: I am expecting twins in two months. I already have children. I just bought my first home. I work at a bank.

content.text: I just remembered. I love to bake, I am a baker
